media:group.media:title: The CULT of Superstar Doctors
media:group.media:description:
The best deal in streaming (seriously): 1 year of CuriosityStream + Nebula for only $14.76 by visiting https://curiositystream.com/medlife and using the code 'medlife'. Sign up today and enjoy thousands of titles on both sites, it's the best way to support this channel. Thank you!

We have a problematic tendency to elevate scientists or doctors to rockstar status, which can lead to fraud, betrayal, malpractice and death. Explore three stories from the exciting but controversial field of regenerative medicine.

Sign up for my free newsletter: https://medlife.substack.com/

The Ballad of Superstar Surgeon Paolo Macchiarini by @Henrik Widegren (go check out his songs!)

-----------------

References:

Link to RetractionWatch: https://retractionwatch.com/ 
Piero Anversa write up in the NYT https://t.co/K0EtQRYIhT
Piero Anversa STAT News https://www.statnews.com/2018/10/14/harvard-brigham-retractions-stem-cell/
Vanity Fair article on Macchiarini https://www.vanityfair.com/news/2016/01/celebrity-surgeon-nbc-news-producer-scam
For Better Science Macchiarini write up: https://forbetterscience.com/2017/11/07/how-trachea-transplanters-tricked-andemariam-beyene-to-sacrifice-himself-for-a-lancet-paper/
ABC 20/20 made a documentary about Macchiarini too, which I only found after finishing this. However, I didn't want to necessarily go into too much detail about the awful complications that patients suffered. Here's a clip: https://twitter.com/ABC2020/status/1360249049295642628?s=20&t=n8yghqPXAOBVVob7FmWjjg

4:20 A change of mind: Head Transplants
9:26 Harvard's house of cards: Cardiac Stem Cells
13:30 He lied about everything: Synthetic Tracheas
22:37 Crime doesn't exist in a vacuum: The Enablers
24:20 Welcome to Maaariokaaart
25:03 Doomed to repeat history
